Age.description: Number of ticks the area effect cloud has existed

Duration.description: Many ticks the area effect cloud should last

ReapplicationDelay.description: How many ticks until the effect get reapplied

WaitTime.description: Time before the area effect cloud appears

OwnerUUIDLeast.description: UUIDLeast of the player who threw the lingering potion

OwnerUUIDMost.description: UUIDMost of the player who threw the lingering potion

DurationOnUse.description: How much "Duration" increases when the effect gets applied

Radius.description: Radius of the area effect cloud

RadiusOnUse.description: How much the radius should decrease when the effect gets applied
